description: It’s bad enough we have to deal with  Zuckerberg & his posse of “fact checkers” , add to this people’s new found roles in censoring one another for expressing a difference of opinion & sprinkle it  with the self-censorship that we are all guilty of. The wait, I can’t post that, because what will they think?  And then tell me what are left with? Mainstream media brainwashing the sleeping masses into imposing their corrupt agenda onto the masses.... i may not agree with everything that others think or say but I respect their right to say it. We should raise questions about what narratives are being ‘corrected’. What is a “conspiracy” or “disinformation”? Should the state or big tech have the power to decide what is true or false in a free society? Just a couple of months ago the notion that there was a whole island where celebs and politicians gathered to commit horrible & devastating  acts on kids was a mere “conspiracy” and now there’s a Netflix special about it... just something to think about before you try to shut people down for thinking differently than you...💯👏🏻🌱
